The ball is loaded and cocked in the toy gun.
The bullet is fired from the gun.
The bullet enters the hole in the ball and is ejected horizontally along with the ball.
The horizontal motion of the ball and the bullet can be described by the kinematic equations: x = v_0t and y = 1/2gt^2.
The ball is on the edge of the table, so its initial vertical position is h.
The bullet is ejected horizontally, so its initial vertical position is 0.
The bullet is ejected horizontally, so its initial velocity in the horizontal direction is v_0.
The bullet is ejected vertically, so its initial velocity in the vertical direction is 0.
